description: 859 Other Business Services not Elsewhere Specified
extraDescription: As part of its mandate, the Office for Disability Issues (ODI) works to promote the Canada Disability Savings Program and encourage take-up. In support of this, since 2009, ODI has contracted with non-governmental organizations to provide public information sessions and one-on-one sessions to increase awareness and understanding of the Program. In 2013, ODI ran a second Request for Standing Offer solicitation, and Compas Inc. qualified as a standing offer agreement holder in that process.
comments: This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool
